p: The median duration on ART was 4 years (IQR 2–7 years) and a significantly greater proportion of men had a low CD4 count (< 350) compared to women (46% vs 25% respectively; p = < 0·001) (Table 2). The median time since last CD4 measure was 8 months (IQR 4–12 months). Nineteen percent of the study population had a detectable HIV viral load (> 40 copies/ml), and 8% had viral load > 1000 copies/ml. The median time since last viral load was 7 months (IQR 4–11 months).
